name: Flying Air Canada's TRANSATLANTIC PREMIUM ECONOMY! 787-8 Toronto to Edinburgh
description:
Back in June, I flew from Toronto to Edinburgh on board Air Canada's 787-8 Dreamliner! It's been almost 4 years since I last flew transatlantic with Air Canada, so I thought it was about time I gave them another try!

With many thanks to @JonathanWinton123 for being such a gracious host while I was in Edinburgh :) Go give him a follow!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Become a Channel Member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCN1SQ1Ffsm_13OQu7MwHXbA/join

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Air Canada (ACA/AC)
Aircraft: Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner (B788)
Flight Number: AC806
Seat: 13A
Livery: Old (2005-2017)
Engines: 2x GEnx-1B
Registration: C-GHQQ
Route: Toronto (YYZ) - Edinburgh (EDI)
Callsign: AIR CANADA 806 heavy
Runway used: 15L (YYZ) - 24 (EDI)
Date filmed: June 2022

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song - "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://youtu.be/bCTTwQ_269c
